bibl.title: Griechische Privatbriefe.

series.title: Papyri Iandanae, cum discipulis edidit Carolus Kalbfleisch.

bibl.seg: Rosenberger Grete, Griechische Privatbriefe. (Papyri Iandanae, cum discipulis edidit Carolus Kalbfleisch. VI.)
Leipzig-Berlin, B.G. Teubner, 1934, 8°, pp. 215-258 et pll. XVII-XX.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 48 (1934) p. 241. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 14 (1934) pp. 349-350. - Paul Collart, RPhil 3e s., 9 (1935) p. 310; REG 48 (1935) pp. 434-435. - Giuseppe Ghedini, RivFil 13 (1935) pp. 104-105. - Marcel Hombert, RBPhil 15 (1936) p. 150. - Marcel Hombert et Claire Préaux, ChrEg 9 (1934) No. 18, p. 374. - Orsolina Montevecchi, BFC 6 (1934) pp. 22-25. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 54 (1934) coll. 1341-1344. - Paul Viereck, HZ 153 (1936) pp. 569-571. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1935) pp. 297-298. - Friedrich Zucker, BZ 34 (1934) pp. 173-174.
